name: Drafting Towers
description:
Drafting Towers is a roguelike card game mixed with a tower defense.

You play as a pharaoh, your goal is to defend your pyramids against aliens. Those aliens constructed the pyramids, but that was a long time ago, now the pyramids are ours!

The game is very challenging, I advise you to start at a low difficulty before going for the real challenge in Hard mode.

Game content

- 30 cards

- 10 buildings to play around

- 3 difficulty modes to keep you entertained

- Multiple hours of gameplay

Screenshots and gifs
Credits

Game design : Axel Neven, Julien Coppenolle, Bastien Bonhomme
Dev : Axel Neven, Yannick Létoh
Art : Julien Coppenolle, Gabriel Tardio

Music : Kevin Macleod

This prototype is mainly a proof of concept. We are working on a brand new version of the game. Our goal with this prototype is to see if people would be interested in a full version of this game.
